name: @sourcegraph/cody-agent
description: Cody JSON-RPC agent for consistent cross-editor support

scripts.build-agent-binaries: pnpm run build && cp dist/index.js dist/agent.js && pkg -t node16-linux-arm64,node16-linux-x64,node16-macos-arm64,node16-macos-x64,node16-win-x64 dist/agent.js --out-path ${AGENT_EXECUTABLE_TARGET_DIRECTORY:-dist}
